sentences.en: At present, coiler control system mostly adopts general FED adjuster.
sentences.cn: 目前, 卷取机控制系统大多采用常规的PID调节器.

sentences.en: Here is the light switch, the temperature adjuster and the wardrobe.
sentences.cn: 这儿是电灯开关 、 温度调节器和衣柜.

sentences.en: Install adjuster nut and lock nut.
sentences.cn: 安装调节器螺母和防松螺母.

sentences.en: Install guide plate and adjuster cable on anchor pin.
sentences.cn: 将导向板和调整器钢缆安装到锚销上.

sentences.en: Lubricate adjuster screw threads and pivot with spray lube.
sentences.cn: 使用喷雾润滑油润滑调整器螺丝螺纹和枢轴.

sentences.en: Minute vertical and lateral adjuster is built in the nozzle.
sentences.cn: 喷嘴安装横向和纵向的为调节装置.

sentences.en: Pull the adjuster bar from the head restraint.
sentences.cn: 从头部保护装置拔除调节器条.

sentences.en: Remove adjuster lever, adjuster screw and spring.
sentences.cn: 拆卸调整器杆, 调整器螺丝和弹簧.

sentences.en: Remove screws attaching the adjuster to the grille opening reinforcement ( GOR ).
sentences.cn: 拆卸用以固定调整器至 格栅 口加固板的螺丝.

sentences.en: The corrosive thing of rubber film is observed in fuel press adjuster.
sentences.cn: 通过疲劳实验,观察燃油压力调节器中橡胶膜片受腐蚀的情况.

sentences.en: The housing bends and kinks as it enters the barrel adjuster.
sentences.cn: 住房弯和纠缠如同它进入木桶调整器.

sentences.en: There is a sensor - adjuster on one side to adjust the intensity.
sentences.cn: 在其一侧有可以调整火焰强度的传感调节器.

sentences.en: This Electro - Thermostatic Water Cabinet is with stainless steel inner and adjuster.
sentences.cn: 本电热恒温水槽,不锈钢内胆、具有调节器.

sentences.en: This is the light switch and that is the temperature adjuster, sir.
sentences.cn: 题:先生, 这是电灯开关,那是温度调节器.

sentences.en: Use to unscrew Flame Adjuster Nut & Pump's Stop Nut.
sentences.cn: 用来旋松火焰调节器螺帽 和 泵的限位螺帽.

words.tran_cn: [电][自]调节器；调停者；（保险等）理算员

phrases.tran_cn: 松紧调整器；空隙调整器；拉紧螺钉

trans.tran_en: An adjuster is a device that allows you to alter a piece of equipment's position or setting
